member.name: P:TransformerToWordPartial.Transformer.Keys
member.summary: Gets dictionary, that maps each valid digit or character their valid word values.

member.name: P:TransformerToWordPartial.Transformer.SpecialKeys
member.summary: Gets dictionary, that maps each non-valid double numbers their text description.

member.name: M:TransformerToWordPartial.Transformer.Transform(System.Double[])
member.summary: Transform each element of source array into its "word format".
member.returns: Array of "word format" of elements of source array.
